Nikon FM - Kodak Portra 400

Thierry Mugler: Couturissime

Foreground left: Harley Davidson-inspired bustier from Mugler's 1992 S/S collection Les Cowboys (worn by Niki Taylor). Famously seen on Emma Wiklund (née Sjöberg) in the music video of George Michael's 1992 song "Too Funky."

Centre: Red Cowgirl from the same 1992 S/S collection, worn by Connie Fleming.

(Light leak: blue hues on the edges of the photos are the result of a light leak. Most 35mm cameras seal light-sensitive chambers with foam padding, which is wont to degrade overtime. In this case, the foam around the back door of the FM had deteriorated, exposing the film to light. While the malfunction can create unique effects, too much can obscure the photo excessively.)

Look 4 of the F/W 1995 collection at the Cirque d'Hiver, worn by Simonetta Gianfelici.
